## Overview

This type is a representation of `Account` as defined in the Credential Exchange Format (CXF) specification. You can supply a JSON representation of a CXF `Account` to initialize an instance of this struct by using a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/JSONDecoder] and calling [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/JSONDecoder/decode(_:from:)]. When using a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/JSONDecoder], set the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/JSONDecoder/dateDecodingStrategy-swift.property] property of the decoder to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/JSONDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy-swift.enum/secondsSince1970].

The account represents the user of the password manager app itself. You can export multiple accounts together by including them in an [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASExportedCredentialData] instance.

# ASImportableAccount

**Structure**

An account for use in importing and exporting credentials.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ASImportableAccount
```

## Overview

This type is a representation of `Account` as defined in the Credential Exchange Format (CXF) specification. You can supply a JSON representation of a CXF `Account` to initialize an instance of this struct by using a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/JSONDecoder] and calling [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/JSONDecoder/decode(_:from:)]. When using a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/JSONDecoder], set the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/JSONDecoder/dateDecodingStrategy-swift.property] property of the decoder to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/JSONDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy-swift.enum/secondsSince1970].

The account represents the user of the password manager app itself. You can export multiple accounts together by including them in an [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASExportedCredentialData] instance.

## Creating an account

- **init(id:userName:email:fullName:collections:items:)**: Creates an account instance from its required and optional properties.

## Accessing account properties

- **id**: A unique identifier for the account.
- **userName**: The username associated with the account.
- **email**: The email address associated with this account.
- **fullName**: The full name of the account owner, if provided.
- **collections**: The collections stored in this account.
- **ASImportableCollection**: A collection of items and subcollections for use in import and export.
- **items**: All items stored in the account.
- **ASImportableItem**: An item for use in import and export.

## Accessing accounts

- **accounts**: An array of importable accounts.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
